tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    duration_minutes INT,
    water_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE,
    irrigation_duration INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    water_source VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    liters_used INT,
    irrigation_schedule_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_irrigation_schedule_id FOREIGN KEY (irrigation_schedule_id) REFERENCES irrigation_schedule(id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_day DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    water_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE water_source (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    flow_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_zone (
    zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_name VARCHAR(50),
    area DECIMAL,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    water_requirement DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    zone_id INT,
    date DATE,
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE WaterSources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    area_covered DECIMAL,
    irrigation_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_id INT REFERENCES WaterSources(source_id)
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES IrrigationSystems(system_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES IrrigationSystems(system_id),
    date DATE,
    amount_used DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WaterEfficiency (
    efficiency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES IrrigationSystems(system_id),
    date DATE,
    efficiency_rating DECIMAL
)
